work.summary: GitHub focuses on tools to build software and connect people in the world of open source

work.summary: Stitch Fix focuses on providing a personal style service to a variety of customers
highlights: Worked on a collaboration shopping experience with an influencer

work.summary: GitHub focuses on tools to build software and connect people in the world of open source
highlights: Worked with the Community & Safety team to close abuse vectors in our existing codebase to make our users safer
Added edit history to PRs, Issues, and comments so users could see what changed, when, and by whom
Worked with other teams to determine what abuse vectors would be in their new features and how to best close them

work.summary: Articulate focuses on the world of e-learning with a variety of products to help support e-learning environments

Designed and integrated single sign on for all Articulate products

Co-taught classes for 13-15 year old students

volunteer.summary: A non-profit organization to help provide affordable tech instruction to women
